name: Hotel Mania: The Game
description:
A Game by MetroTree

Goals:
As an employee of Hotel de Merde, you're job is to clean the rooms to pristine condition. As if there was no sign of previous guests staying here at all!

Controls:
W, A, S, D => Movement
Mouse => Camera View
E Key => Clean / Use
Z Key => Give Up/Quit

Bed Notes:
Strip the beds to get the dirty sheets.
Use the Washing Machine to handle the rest!

Credits:

Partners: Michael Conaway and Kale DeYoung

Programming, Prefab Setup: Michael Conaway

Models, Textures, Music, Level Design: Kale DeYoung

All Content in this game is originally made! Hope you enjoy!
